org.apache.giraph.hive.input.edge

类 SimpleHiveToEdge<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:

    所有已实现的接口:
    com.facebook.giraph.hive.schema.HiveTableSchemaAware, Iterator<org.apache.giraph.io.iterables.EdgeWithSource<I,E>>, org.apache.giraph.conf.ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>, HiveToEdge<I,E>

    public abstract class SimpleHiveToEdge<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends AbstractHiveToEdge<I,E>
    Simple implementation of HiveToEdge when each edge is in the one row of the input.
